author: Biagio Rispoli
comment: I was wondering why the game wasn't showing up in the widget. And then I realized that the widget is supposed to be an ugly little thumbprint, and the actual game takes place in the app which you have to manually open, making the widget completely redundant. I'm sure the game is fun but why bother with the widget element if it's executed this stupidly?

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. The widget is not redundant. The main idea behind this game is that you play it by tapping the widget. Open the game itself (application) to find out what happened (how were your taps transformed). We added other options to play the game - Tap Head, Tap by Voice and taps on Android Wear device but the main idea stays the same.

author: Awesome Azz
comment: I can't believe that this game only has 100thousand downloads it should be way more than that. Thanks for the great game

author: HEMA ROY
comment: Its good

author: Gaming Guy
comment: Hated it

author: Massimo Pavoni
comment: This game had really surprised me the first time I've played it. Why? Because you have so much things that you can find...and you don't have nothing to do apart from clicking a bunch of times on a simple button!

author: obalinv 12
comment: Nagyon jó kis játék, azt hiányolom belőle, hogy pl a science pontokat fel lehetne használni új dolgok kikutatására, stb. Amúgy egész jó.

author: Summer Perez
comment: I just love love love this game. Usually I don't go for tap games but this one is just lovely. I like that you're surprised with different items and all you have to do is tap and collect, I know I'm not being very articulate right now but I don't care!!! I love this game I'm obsessed!!

author: ShadowThePlayer
comment: They game is amazing and simple. I love all. I just wish their was the abilities to customize my character, if there is and im blind please do tell me!

author: AuSurfer
comment: Hello, Just one question to ask. How could I use this in my android gear? Btw Its amazing game

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. The Android Wear portion of the game is going to be installed automatically on your watch when you install the game on your smartphone (paired with watch). Just open the app on your watch and you can tap or tap by voice on your watch. Feel free to send us an email in case of any questions.

author: GenericMinecraftYoutuber82638296192782 1823
comment: Innovative and addictive. Must get

author: Jeth Martin
comment: Hey ru3ch initiative,can you guys repeat the quest where i can get the quest item #293 up to #384 i didn't got a chance to accept the quest because i couldn't open my quest tab now i can't finish the waifu quest pls help thanks:)

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. Sure - we republish quests over and over. It may take some time but you will definitely have a chance to get those items.

comment: Great! Just add more maps, items and other funny stuff!

author: Chuck
comment: Really cool idea. I wish there was an auto tap function so I could progress while I'm working and not wear out my thumb! Also it would be awesome to have character creation and gender selection. With these two additions I'd reinstall and support the game!

author: Ammo Clip
comment: Achievements leaderboards quests and save games what's not to love what more can you ask for.

author: Filizo Broniversal
comment: Ru3ch initiative has bright, new, brilliant concepts and ideas that makes me amazed.

author: Hiraeth
comment: The game is great, but more maps and just generally new additions will be much appreciated (Also, how tf are you supposed to reach level 1 million? That's crazy)

author: Shinichi Zio
comment: A mediocre clicker game whose bad unique controls and pretensions annoy me.
I really love this game I have absolutely no idea how but it is so fun and Soo addicting no matter what app I am using I'll be playing this game at the same time 😄😄😄😍😘

author: Spoix
comment: This game definitely deserves 4.3+ rating.Its so cool,unique and addictive.

author: Sri Chakri Kothur
comment: The invite I sent does not reach the account of the receiver. Can you tell me why?

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero, please send us an email and we will be happy to help.

author: John Kristoffer Bonus
comment: This game is great guys. Hope you try this.

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. This happens only in an area where the item (location pass) is required to make the area available. Travel to a different area and sell the item then. Feel free to send us an email in case of further questions and we will be happy to help.

author: Catman
comment: Cool game

author: Bits
comment: Love the comedy of the game and the item names. The game also has a neat graphics style. Edit: This "Dark Forrest" update is my favorite one to date.  I love the added difficulty of the hunger element.

author: Teh Dyzaster
comment: Like the game, but after completing the quest for the male lifeguard suit thr game crashed and erased it. Now I can't complete the other quests.

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. Please check your mailbox :)

author: Candyce Woody
comment: This game is just so much fun with all the items you can collect... It's a great time killer and is fun for hours.

author: Afedd 2020
comment: Just tapping and leveling up and gathering loot is boring I want to see the battle

author: John Bender
comment: Please add more features like text based boss fight or more weird encounter

author: Romeo Cabili
comment: I didn't get the widget when I downloaded the app.

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. Please make sure the game is installed in the internal memory (not on SD card). Alternatively, activate 'Tap Head' from navigation drawer and tap it to progress through the game (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZeBdbZrFrw).

comment: It Made Me Download it because of the knight costume picture thingy

author: DavMan101
comment: Good game I love it its a good time user

Keeps loading between app switching as blank interface (clicks supposably still save). Widget is graphics less, different from impression and what is the recording part to mean. Would have preferred share link instead of just excerpt but aside from the coming and going floating widget, as good as promised.

author: Saint Typhoon
comment: I love the game and everything about this.  The only thing I dislike is the equip and drop is together.  I've recently dropped my turtle and unicorn outfit.  But oh well!

author: Dragos Branişte
comment: It's a good game but every time I toggle tap hero, my smartphone's touchscreen freeze. Please fix that

author: Justin
comment: When I first installed this game it didn't seem like much,but once you get into it it's an amazing game! I can play it anywhere, from my home screen or even my Android Wear watch. Don't listen to the 3.7 rating, this is a 5 star game!

author: da parkour master
comment: Great game just one thing I did a quest to get altayrs costume and I did it but as I was getting my prize the game crashed and I didn't get it I thought it was alright and I could just buy it but when I looked it wasn't on wy item list so I can't buy it or do the quest again I would be very thankful if I at least got to buy it my Google account name is blackblackb thank you

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. Please send us an email and we can send you the item as a gift. Please make your profile public or make sure it's public (Apps - Google Settings - Play Games - Game Profile - Public) and send us your username (Widget RPG - Achievements - 3-dots button at the top right corner - Settings - Edit profile). Take care and have fun with the game.

author: goovy dood
comment: Ok obviously this is a edit but I saw this glitch, if I got these legit items and I press it again I lose those legit items

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. You may loose items from your inventory you don't have equipped in a lost fight. Move all items you care about to the kloud inventory - they are safe there.

author: Blocky Blocks
comment: This game is perfect. You can play it everywhere and it is easy to play very cool concept loved it. Recommended for everyone

author: Backup Account
comment: Great concept just needs an online platform for socializing via famebook but this is so awesome and extremely creative good job guys

author: Derek Carlisle
comment: Very easy to progress; easy missions, funny characters that you friend on the in-game social media. Thanks for the reply on my gear s2 problem. Do you think it is possible in the future to work with the gear?

reply.author: ru3ch initiative
reply.content: Hi Hero. Thank you for your review and for playing Widget RPG! Samsung Gear S2 runs on Tizen (OS developed by Samsung) unfortunately so it's not a compatible Android Wear device. We hope you still enjoy playing our game on your smartphone :)

author: Diva Balpir
comment: Fun Game, At first i thought this game isn't that good but when watching your hero grows looks really fun and making it addictive! Anyway can you please update more frequently because i want more items, Npc, and more minigames thanks for this great game tho!
title: Simple But Addictive
